games.description: Drag the hexagon tiles onto the platform, collect the tiles with the same number in order to merge them into one when they touch. Add them all up to reach 4096, to complete the level.
The main objective of the game is that you outbeat your opponent by pocketing all of your chosen balls, and win the game. You can either play against the computer or a friend.
Tap on and hold until your preferred power has been reached, release and ace! You have scored into the hole.

Classic Air Hockey is a game where two players play aginst each other on a low-friction table. Here you can play online vs the computer or a friend. The aim of the game is to score higher than your oponent and win the game.

The aim of the game is to connect the green ball to the green circle. By sliding to the desired direction it will move. When a two-way street comes along, slide towards the most likely one to be the way. Collect all the stars to reach 200 and win the game.

The objective of the game is to fill out the entire map by dragging the animal to the corresponding balls to pass the stage. Try to save steps, in order to use them into more difficult stages of the game.

Entering the surfing world with a twist of archery. Begin your amazing journey of surfing trough the waves and shooting down your enemies. Shoot as many and as quickly as you can, before they shoot you down. With the coins you earn you can purchase, different arrow upgrades during gameplay in order to score as many points as possible.

Showcase your aiming skills, by choosing two different game modes. You can either choose story mode and compete in the tournaments, or free mode and train your aim. To shoot you need to tap, hold and move the bow - so the crosshair is at the target. Watch the direction of the wind as it plays a major role in your arrow’s trajectory. Release when you think is best and receive your score. Aim to score higher, in order to achieve the gold medal.

Ready to shoot some hoops? Grab a ball and start dunking! BallsComing is a hot action game that anybody can enjoy! Instead of shooting the hoops however, you get to draw a line and make the ball reach the hoop without shooting it.

Batter King is the game where you can really showcase your cricket skills, the moment the target of the ball is green. Use the keys or tap to hit the ball, and score. The ultimate goal of the game is to score as many points as you can!
Tap along the screen, to move your character by avoiding the bullets, slice up your enemies and reach the finish line.
Hold to shoot, place your target on the enemy and let go. Upgrade your weapons, helmet and armor to level up. Choose between different modes depending on your desired play.
Aim and shoot, destroy all the enemies on your way. Remember, you can constantly upgrade your guns and equipment. Only by becoming stronger can we go further
The objective of the game is to collect all the passengers, and go through the map and its obstacles, to reach the final destination. You play by tapping and holding on the screen.

Sugar Free area, let me clear all the candies! Tap to shoot the candy, but take care not to shoot at the rotating barriers, cuz your bullets will bounce off when hitting them and deal damage to yourself.

The aim of the game is to get rid of all the bubbles that are stuck on the pillar before they reach the bottom. Match the given colored bubble to any 2+ of the same colour to pop them and reduce the bubbles. By sliding to look around the tower, and tapping to shoot the bubble at its given trajectory. You can tap on an angle or straight in order to match with the rest of the bubbles. Being patient here is the key, along with using the right strategic movements.

Shoot on the different cubes and gain more points as you can. Drag to aim your target, and the bubbles you shoot will bounce back once they hit any of the cubes or the two sides of the wall. Try to clear the cubes with fewer shots before they rise to the upper line.

You could also be one of a kind! Drag to aim your enemies, and be aware that your bullet is limited, try to shoot down more enemies with fewer bullets. Make good use of the walls because your bullets bounce off when they hit the wall, and your bullets can penetrate the enemies standing in line.
Tap on the aim of the enemies to kill them off. Choose a different weapon, or character. Reload the guns by scrolling down.

The objective of the game is to get rid of all the bubbles and reach the desired score, to continue onto the next level. With the given bubble aim and tap to shoot at the colored set of bubbles to pop them all. To skip all the bubbles aim to clear a path and snap the bubble with the star, which will give you a huge amount of points and progress you onto the next level.

MyChess3D is a game of mind and focus, in which you have to checkmate the opponent's king by placing it under inescapable threat of capture. To this end, a player's pieces are used to attack and capture the opponent's pieces while supporting one another. You can choose 6 difficulties, play against a friend or the computer.

The objective of the game is to collect all the non-colour balls with the color balls, and collect them all into the box. Tap on the silver keys, in order to remove them and let the color balls mix with the non-color balls to increase their sizes. Remove all the silver keys and collect all of the color balls. Watch out for the bombs and other traps along the levels.
Tap along to change the direction of the ball, once the ball on the map changes colour collect the specified ball colours.

I'm sure you got brains to figure this out. Put the rings with different colours and sizes on the panel, and match 3 rings with same colour in a line to clear them. The more progress you make, the more various colours you will meet. Good luck buddy!

As a sharpshooter, no one is allowed to survive under your muzzle. Drag to aim, release to shoot, kill all your enemies! Your bullets can penetrate the enemies standing in line, so choose an effective shooting strategy with fewer bullets. There will be various skins for you that will bring about different improvements.
Shoot the tower, but do not shoot the barriers protecting the tower, because you will die. Shoot the tower precisely to progress further down the game.

The aim of the game is to get rid of all the boxes off the platform. You have to substitute the boxes with the required explosives you think is best to get rid of all the boxes. By tapping on the desired box and tap again on the desired dynamite. Each bomb has its different abilities, once you think you are done tap on the bomb starter.

I know your need for speed and drift, an awesome driver needs an amazing racer! Get super racers to complete more tasks! Collect gems by matching cars, the cars will be produced as time goes by. You can purchase more powerful racers, which have better performance when racing. You will receive different tasks, try to finish them to complete a mission.

Dominate the battle ground, you are the last survivor! Grab every second to find and equip with a weapon after you land, search for your enemies and defeat them. The safety zone will become smaller and smaller as the time goes by, be aware of any upcoming battles, you only have one chance you know.
Walk around and smash your enemies whie in the arena. You are in the wilderness, with your choise of weapon a hammer - fight for your survival! There is only room for one hammer master!

Drive to the goal with your super racer! Press to go right and release to go left, collect more coins on your road, take care not to fall of the race track. The cars in your garage will make money for you, and you can assemble a better car with two same cars.

The objective of the game is to slice up all vegetables by tapping on the screen, and reach the end. Try to avoid slicing on the wooden or iron plates, as it makes you lose your streak and slows you down.

Objective of the game is to finish the race first. Tap on the screen to speed up, collect weapons and abilities to knock the others off their bikes. Upgrade your motorbike, and props, to improve your racing abilities. Unlock maps by completing tasks and races. Login daily to receive amazing rewards.

The aim of the game is to get rid of all the bandits and collect the stars along the way. By aiming with sliding and taping to shoot the first blue portal, which creates the start for the object to go through. Where the second yellow bullet is set to the desired trajectory to collect the stars and kill the bandit.
Fast action speed racing with your boat or car around endless race track. One tap easy to learn controls with addictive gameplay.
The aim of the game is to get the highest score possible, by going through the map, making stunts and collecting carts to achieve combo points. Tap and hold to increase the speed of your train.

The objective of the game is to score the highest number of points versing your oponent which can be the computer or a friend. If playing against the computer you can choose a difficulty from easy, medium or hard. The most common objective is to reduce a fixed score, 301 or 501 to zero.
Jump and find your way trough danger in this rhythm-based action platformer! Prepare for a near impossible challenge for your little giant to jump trough dangerous passages and spiky obstacles.
The objective of the game is to kill off the contestants the moment they are all on the killing areas by tapping on the screen, in order to progress onto the next level.

Defend the treasurer from the enemies, by building towers. Drag and drop tow of the same level towers to upgrade into a better tower. Complete quests to receive gold and strengthen your capabilities to improve your game.

Collect the specified eggs, by tapping on 2 or more sets of the same eggs, to collect. You cannot collect the eggs by tapping on only one, try to click on as many eggs as possible to save onto moves and move onto the next level.

The objective of the game is to reach the highest possible rank in regards to being the best fairy model. By collecting fairy power, and purchasing upgrades and leveling up your fairies. Tap onto the collect button, to keep earning fairy power. Purchase different types of fairies to earn higher fairy power, along with different power-up abilities in regards to collecting fairy power. Once enough fair power has been gathered, tap on the “Make” section and create your desired outfit. Once that is done, tap on the play button, choose or mix your outfit to enter the competition. Rank the other fairies in order to increase your rank as well.
Play Fairy Tales a puzzle game where you can indulge yourself into magical stories from unicorns to giant mushrooms and so on.

Feed to defeat the monster, it’s time to feast! Feed the monsters till they eat themselves to death. Tap the right item or food which is displayed on the screen to feed the monster. Try to feed the monster without any mistake so that you can get a Feast Time which can help you feed the monster much more quickly.

The objective of the game is to get the highest score possible. By tapping and holding, along with sliding around the screen to steer the vehicle. Maneuver your way around the other cars, follow the green arrow to collect different abilities to defend yourself and continue to rank up the score.
The glass is empty. Your Job is to draw a line to make the glass filled up with liquid.

Stand with me, comrades, we shall rest when we are dead! Clear all the enemies and survive till the end. Hold the screen to control your move, you will attack your enemies when they are within your shooting range. You can upgrade your weapons to gain stronger power, even call an ally to fight with you side by side. Collecting and using some items will make it easier to complete missions and tasks.

Swipe to aim and shoot, pay attention to the falling stones, do not let them hit on you. You will get coins as rewards every time you complete a mission, and these coins could be used for upgrading your power.
When aiming at the range, tap on the yellow button to shoot and gain the most points by hitting the bullseye. Buy more weapons and merge the same two weapons to create a greater weapon.
Tap along to collect the fishes. By fishing you can earn the money, with the money you can upgrade your boat - as it increases your fishing skills.

The objective of the game is to get the ball through the hoop, by tapping and making the hoop go into the direction of the ball. Try to get at least 5 points before your opponent gets any, and before the timer runs out. Claim your rewards and unlock special deals.

Anything can be frozen except my way! Keep cool, everything’s in a flash! Help the princess go through her road. Tap to freeze the obstacles on your way, take care of the timing you freeze, make sure the frozen parts won’t stop your steps. You can also collect gems on the road, freeze the rotating gems at the right time will help you collect more gems.

I like fruits, both eating and killing! You won’t like fruits when they are angry! Clear all the fruit monsters in the mission. Tap and hold the screen to move, shoot and dodge until you clear all the fruit monsters. Use coins to upgrade your abilities, use gems to upgrade your weapons. Go across more chapters, unlock more new weapons.
Are you a catcher, choose your favourite sports team and demonstrate your skills by sliding your finger or mouse along the screen to catch the ball.
Like playing softball but online, hide behind the obstacles and shoot the other players in order progress further onto the next level. Tap when you are ready to shoot!
Move the ball to its desired location by tapping and swiping up. Claim your rewards, so you can purchase different types of skins.
Tap on the arrows to make the box turn and make the zombie fall down onto the target, by converting the human into a zombie. Try to get three stars in the desired moves.
Control the vehicle and climb over the hills. Timing is very important. If the car does not overturn, the car may be destroyed or killed. Are you ready to go?
Tap on to speed up and collect the customer, and drop him off at his final destination.

The objective of the game is to collect all the food, and feed it to the given animals. In this case collect all the watermelons and feed it to the hippos. Tap and slide the tool to collect all the food, watch out for birds and other obstacles along the map. You need to pass all the mini-games before passing onto the next level. Pass the levels to collect, rubies and purchase new food collecting tools.
The main objective of the game is to feed the monster, by going all the way into enemy lines and grabbing the egg, then going back by avoiding the given obstacles to feed the big monster.
The objective of this puzzle game is to make the easiest possible path for the bunny to get to its carrots and reach the end.
Manage your restaurant and idle profit, make a strategy to increase your business, hire chefs + upgrade their skills, upgrade kitchen set - make more money and progress further up the game.

The aim of the game is to maximise the characters and be the greatest empire ever. Drag and drop two of the same level of characters together to create a more advanced character. Spin the lucky wheel to get free rewards, to get more coins tap on the speedup option. Log In to get offline bonuses and improve your empire.

The objective of the game is to get the monkey to the bottom. By holding onto the screen and moving, in order to get the monkey to fit in between the leaves. Miss as many as possible levels to make the monkey powerful enough to crush the leafs if you miss the gap.

Control the jumping ball to the bottom. Press the screen to smash the bricks, release to stop smashing and stay jumping. Only the color bricks can be smashed, and the black brick will break you if you try to smash it. Straight smashing will charge your super which can destroy any bricks for seconds.

The main objective is to kill all the zombies, by moving forward and shoving the zombies off the top of the building to move onto the next, and get to the helicopter. You can upgrade your character, weapons.

Kimbap Run is a puzzle strategy game, where you play by tapping to change the directions of where you are going. It is a continuous game, as you progress the levels will change and will make it harder for you to achieve a high score.
Swipe around and aim at the enemies, before the map closes down on you. Upgrade your skills and weapons to increase the chances of you winning the game.
Aim and tap to shoot to ruin the balance of the structure, progress further in the game.
Collect as many people as possible, by tapping and holding to collect all. Upgrade your vehicle, to increase stability and load of people.

The goal of the game is to get the donuts to fly through the ball. Get to 5 points before your opponent does. By doing so you will progress further in the game, receive gold and purchase different skins.
Magic Jigsaw puzzles is a free game for users of all ages! Choose the way your puzzle is wanted with x81 pieces or x144, x256. Select your desired photo to do and become the ultimate puzzle solver!

The objective of the game is to connect four pieces of the same number and form a more advanced piece to deal a higher damage. You cannot move a piece to an empty spot, if it's blocked by all it's sides. You can choose two different modes, an endless gameplay or a storymode.

The road ahead is still very long with many obstacles, you need more resources to help you overcome them. Long press to overlay stairs with the bricks you collect on the road, do not approach the red region when you marching ahead. Try to collect more bricks so that you will achieve more rewards when you reach the final.

The goal of the game is to get mahjong, or get rid of all the tiles in sets of four and one pair. Tap one of the blocks and find its consecutive clone, tap them fast if you want to activate streak ability and increase your score. Slide around, zoom in or out to look at the whole structure.

Mahjong Link is a fun skill building tile game. Tiles are stacked at different levesl and is up to the player to find the correct match for each tile. Players have a choice of diffuculty when they first enter the game. Mahjong is famous for its abillity to induce Zen type state for those who play it. It also builds on problem solving skills because it requires, the players to plan out moves in advance to allow for the highest possible number of matches following the current move.

The aim of the game is to get rid of all the cubes, by connecting two of the same blocks together before the timer runs out. You cannot select a block that is covered by all sides with a block that is uncovered. Both of the blocks need to be free by at least 3 of its sides!

The aim of the game is to defend the egg from the upcoming enemies, and progress into the next levels. Merge two of the same characters by dragging them on top of each other to build up a stronger character. Fight off waves of  bugs and take down bosses to unlock new cards and abilities. Take a break and watch your cute characters do all the work for you while you are away. Come back to see your progress and claim your idle earnings.
No one can say no to these cute kitties, will you? Raise and merge 2 same cats into 1 better cat, keep them in your yard and get rewards, build your homeland, enjoy your time with these lovely cats.
Prove you are a better shooter by shooting down all the targets. Select your prize. Merge the guns to create an improved version of your gun, and progress further in the game.

Slide around to find characters to kill. Kill as many heros as possible to win coins and pass the level. Use the coins to upgrade your weapons, merge two of the same heros to upgrade into a stronger hero and kill the others.

The objective of the game is to find all the gems, drag them and merge them together to create a greater gem. Rank up and earn coins, by collecting the jewellery. Use the coins to purchase higher levels of gems to pop up inside the boxes on the field.

Tap the next block, collect as many ores as possible, tap on the dynamites or magma cubes to blow up a larger area of the cave. Once you have reached the bottom collect your reward, purchase upgrades to level up your miner to unlock different game modes.

The objective of the game is to destroy the given stones, and move along the next level. Hold and drag along, to let the miner throw his pickaxe to destroy the stones. Watch out for the stones to not hit you because you will die. You can purchase upgrades for your pickaxe and throwing speed, in order to be more efficient.

Only one can survive on this battlefield! Are you ready for the brawl? Long press your screen to move the planet and pick up blades, each blade you collect will take effect on attacking and defending. The more blades you have, the more power you will get, but you should know that do not attempt to attack any other who is under defending, or you can have a try. lol

The objective of the game is to kill off the bandits. Aim by holding and dragging your pointer to the desired trajectory in order to kill off the bandits. With each level completed you earn cash, with that cash you can purchase different types of skins and firearms.

Fired up and ready to serve. Pass and crash, I am in the rush! Drive your car as long-distance as possible till your fuel run out. Press the screen to keep speeding up, you can also get extra speed-up by crashing other cars. You got different goals in different modes, try to win a higher rank in challenge mode. Use coins to upgrade your racers.
See what babysitting is all about as you take care of the baby. From showering, to aftershower, playing, feeding, teaching, grooming, dressing and sleeping.

The objecitve of the game is to roll the ball and knock over the other oponent's pin. Knocking over a pin scores one point. Knocking all 5x or 10x pins scores you 5 or 10 points (strike). If playing against the computer, you can choose the difficulty from easy, medium and hard. You can also choose how many pins to have 5 or 10. Or you can also play against a friend.
Unicorn is your favourite animal, well in this game you take care of your chosen unicorn. From bathing, to grooming, health checks, feeding, and dress ups.
The objective of the game is to rescue the panda and it's friends from the wolfs, and the desesrted land.

Penguin gogogo! Full speed dash ahead and never look back! Tap the left and right button to control the penguin to move, jump on the ice road and be careful not to drop off. The ice road will keep collapsing behind you, so try to speed up your movements in order not to be caught.
Match the coloured boxes, until the pets start showing up, match the pets and progress further in the game. The game relies on logical and time skills.
Find three or more identical squares in a row and eliminate them. Don't let the square top the top of the screen. There will be magical props to help you.
Tap the black keys before they disappear to pass onto the next level. Tap on the red hearts to collect, to give yourself a second life. You can browse from a selection of songs.

Ready to train your brain and put your logical skills to the test? Play TapMyWater now! With different type of blocks, you get to really enhance your logical skills. All you need to do is slide block pipes, connect them and make water paths. Easy to play and get addicted while playing this connect water pipe puzzle game.
Plant Beat Zombies, a 2D casual player version of plants vs zombies - purchase the desired plant. Upgrade them by merging them together and kill of the dropping zombies from the sky.

Nobody can stop this canty puppy, help him jump to the final! The puppy will keep running towards unless you tap the screen to make puppy act, the signal will make puppy jump or turn as the different arrows instruct. You should also tap at the right timing so that your puppy won't drop off the road.

You only live once, but here we got another chance! Wanna start a completely new life? Just try this life simulator now! Here you can rearrange your career, achieve much more fortune with your effort, luck, and business talent. Dating with different lovers and purchasing massive cars or houses you like could never be such an easy thing! What are you waiting for, just start your new life now!
Tap on, to create the desired length for the bridge, move on the buildings and save the pets. You can switch between your pets that you have acquired or roles.

Shark is coming, help the pirate escape now! Turn left and right to keep climbing up the mast, be careful do not crash on the obstacle boards, or you will drop off and feed the shark. Also you can try to collect more drumsticks on your way, but don't forget 'safety first'.
Aim and shoot at the cubes, to fully clear out the mainfield.
Tap on the shooting cannon, to smash the fruit. Upgrade your weapons and increase your ammo, to progress onto the next level.
Finish the race before your opponents do. Hold and drag to change the direction of where you are going to.

Shoot and score, you are the player of all! Get more points as you can within limited chances. Tap to shoot, swipe to control its target, you can also drag a curve to let the ball cross the wall set by defenders, also be aware of the goalkeeper, he is very swift.
The main objective of the game is to release and, play in position in sequence from ace through king to collect all four suits. Patience is the key to winning this game!

Slide to aim and shoot the upcoming cells. The numbers on the cells show the counts of shots that break them into pieces. Big cells will divide into smaller cells, take care not to be hit by them. You can also collect different buffs from smashing the cells, which will bring you great power-up.
Tap and slide on the screen to kill off the rest of the zombies, and pass the level.

This puzzle takes a bit of kop. This is a math puzzle that you will find hard to stop playing. Drop the number cubes on the board, when 2 cubes with the same number touch, they merge into one. Try to merge more cubes till 2048 was created. Some items could be purchased with the coins you collect.

Defend till the end! Remain alert, I will protect! Defend your castle from enemies and monsters. Manage your troops, heroes, skills and equipment to defend your castle from being attacked. Coins and gems are the two important resources that can make you more powerful. Tap to spawn the troops you want in the battle, they will behave better performance when different units fight together.

This could be the best golf simulator ever! Tap the screen when the arrow stops at the center. You will swing a lob shot first, and try to keep the ball in the green area, so that you will have another chance to chip in. You can also use cash to upgrade your abilities, which will help you make a better performance and get more cash rewards.

Tap the screen at the right time to let your brothers catch you and throw you again! The lower the drop, the higher the throw will be. The higher the position, the faster falling speed will be, the harder is to find the time.

Table tennis could never be so easy! Everyone is master here! Press to hold the racket, catch the moment to block and strike back, you can also draw a curve on the screen to make a rotating ball which make  your opponent harder to chase.
Reach the desired level by destroying the tower before running out of moves. By shooting the given coloured ball towards the corresponding colour on the tower.

Defend your homeland, you are going to build the last shield! Drag to plant the selected weapons on the specific land. You will get coins from every enemy you killed, then use the coins to upgrade your weapons and strengthen your power. Some super is also provided in case you come across plenty of creeps rushing to you.

Want to satisfy your challenge seeking, and make it really satisfying challenge. The ultimate Traffic Passing game is here! Think outside the box and you'll be expert of the game. Try this addicitve game and train your mind to solve each level, prove that ou are the smartest champion.

If you are looking for a driving casual game, Traffic Run is the game you are looking for. Driving requires attention and askill. So with the help of your reflexes, try to reach the finish line without hitting other vehicles and collect gold coins. Be careful not to hit the other cars. This fun game will offer you a nice gaming experience.
Tap and slide to change into the shape required for you to pass through.

Trapped Pirate is a puzzle strategy game, where you have to kill off the other bandits with your sword, along with other abilities that pop up. Shields, potions, bombs and treasures play in your favour, in order to leverage the battlefield and level up.
Put the pink cube into place, by either swiping left or right in order to build the road and let the ball pass.

Speed is not always the only need, sometimes we also need a little skill. Here we provide you a rare chance to be an outlaw drifter, tap to control your car perform drifts and crash police cars as you wish, No traffic rules will stop you from rushing.

Create viruses, and merge two of the same to unlock a new stronger virus. Defeat the enemy  by attacking other small neutral viruses and conquer their home and increase your army. Buy Upgrades to level up and destroy the other viruses.
Kill off the other zombies by moving around the map, kill them to collect gold and level up your weapons, to progress in the game.

Collect the given animals. Tap on the block containing the selected animal but they must be 2 or more of the same animals together, in order to collect them all. Combine certain sets of blocks to unlock power ups..

The main objective of the game is to match 3 like marbles by shooting them from the cannon. Match more than 3 and you will get power ups, that you can match again and destroy a wide range of marbles. Match them all before they reach the tunnel, to progress into the next level.
